description:
Hitomi is interested in Washinomori`s condition. She has been observing how much effort Kurokan puts into baseball.
Hitomi believes that Kurokan can make another Kirino miracle and take Washinomori into Koshien Stadium.
Kurokan changes his mind and decides to participate in the fall championships, but they never thought their first oppoent would be Kirino!
Source: crunchyroll
